Statute.Title: Canada Strategic Infrastructure Fund Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Fonds canadien sur l’infrastructure stratégique, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Infrastructure, Communities and Intergovernmental Affairs (SI/2015-94)

Repeal.Text: Repeal, 2024, c. 15, s. 340, the act is repealed on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 341(2)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2002, c. 9, s. 47 in force on assent 27.03.2002
CIF, 2024, c. 15, s. 340 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 341(2) — Not in force
